EmailTemplate.description: Response for March 2012 MDD webinar featuring White & Case
EmailTemplate.name: Webinar Response - Mar12 MDD Webinar
EmailTemplate.subject: IntApp Webinar Confirmation
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
{!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName}:
Thank you for registering for the IntApp Integration Builder Webinar. The login details are below.
Title: Mastering Master Data and IT Architecture Date: Wednesday, March 28 Time: 8am Pacific / 11am Eastern / 4pm BST Duration: 1 hour
Video:
Conference URL: http://www.infiniteconferencing.com/Events/intapp/ Participant Code: 97447854
Audio:
Conference Audio Dial In: US/Canada: (888) 567-1603 UK: 00 800 4747 4646 International Toll: (201) 604-5052
(You will not need to give the operator a passcode, just the title of the webinar)
